OperatingHoursHoliday.name: OperatingHoursHoliday
OperatingHoursHoliday.description: Represents the day or hours for which a service territory and service resources exclusive to the service territory are unavailable in Salesforce Scheduler.

DateAndTime.description: (Read-Only) The date or time for the holiday.

HolidayId.description: The ID of the holiday that’s related to the operating hours indicated in the OperatingHoursId field.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that the current user last viewed a record related to this object.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this object.

OperatingHoursHolidayNumber.description: (Read-Only) An auto-generated number identifying the operating hours holiday.

OperatingHoursId.description: The ID of the operating hours that’s related to the holiday indicated in the HolidayId field.
